code: public void testRequestCacheSet() throws Exception {     final HashMap<String, String> params = new HashMap<>().     params.put("request", "true").     final RestRequest restRequest = new FakeRestRequest.Builder(xContentRegistry()).withParams(params).build().     ClearIndicesCacheRequest cacheRequest = new ClearIndicesCacheRequest().     cacheRequest = RestClearIndicesCacheAction.fromRequest(restRequest, cacheRequest).     assertThat(cacheRequest.requestCache(), equalTo(true)). }
